I buy most of my clothes from Amazon and am very particular about material, style, and fit. The quality is fantastic! It's rayon and polyester and the feel of the fabric and the stretch is wonderful. It's obviously very form fitting and that's why I sized up to a medium. I might return to size up to a large for a more comfortable fit. It's a little short in the torso but not quite a crop top. I absolutely recommend this top and I'll be buying in neutral colors. For reference I'm 5'8, 154lbs and wearing a medium in the photo. I have broad shoulders so off the shoulder isn't the most flattering, which is why I like the one sleeve covers the shoulder. Can be worn on either the right or left side. Buy it! Cheers!
